Sequence Information.Target Organism: Gram-negative bacteria:Escherichia coli (MIC=6.7-12.5 µM), Vibrio Parahaemolyticus (MIC>25.0 µM), Pseudomonas aeruginosa (MIC>25.0 µM), Vibrio.harveyi (MIC=12.5-25.0 µM).Gram-positive bacteria:Bacillus subtilis (MIC=1.2-2.5 µM), Staphylococcus aureus (MIC=2.5-5.0 µM), Sarcina luteus (MIC=1.2-2.5 µM), Bacillus megaterium (MIC=2.5-5.0 µM).Fungi:Candida albicans (MIC=6.7-12.5 µM), Monilia albican (MIC=12.5-25.0 µM).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Function: Myticusin-1 exhibites stronger anti-microbial properties against Gram-positive bacteria more than Gram-negative bacteria and fungus.

Literature.Title: Molecular characterization of a novel antimicrobial peptide from Mytilus coruscus.
Literature.Author: Liao Z, Wang XC, Liu HH, Fan MH, Sun JJ, Shen W.
